snippet: The Senate confirmed two new appointees to the Federal Reserve Board, moves expected to bolster the position of Janet Yellen on key policy decisions.
abstract: Senate confirms Lael Brainard to one of three open seats on the Federal Reserve Board, and confirms current member Jerome H Powell to a new term; also confirms Stanley Fischer as Fed's vice chairman; changes are expected to bolster the position of chairwoman Janet Yellen on key policy decisions.
lead_paragraph: The Senate confirmed two new appointees to the Federal Reserve Board, moves expected to bolster the position of Janet Yellen on key policy decisions.

headline.seo: Fed Nominees Lael Brainard and Stanley Fischer Pass Senate Vote
headline.main: Three Confirmations to Fed Board May Strengthen Yellen’s Hand
headline.print_headline: Three Confirmations to Fed Board May Strengthen Yellen’s Hand
